definition[0]: a problem or difficulty that you must deal with before you can achieve something
note[0]: overcome/clear/get over etc a hurdle (=deal successfully with a problem)
example[0]: Finding enough money for the project was the first hurdle.
definition[1]: one of a series of small fences that a person or horse has to jump over during a race
note[1]: clear a hurdle (=successfully jump over a hurdle)
definition[2]: to jump over something while you are running
example[1]: He hurdled the fence and ran off down the street.
